ARs.caption: RPC URL
ARs.doc: Provide a RPC url for the default provider for the network you want this NFT smart contract deployed on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
ARs.name: default_provider

ARt.caption: Name
ARt.doc: The name if the NFT smart contract.
ARt.name: name

ARu.caption: Description
ARu.doc: The description of this ERC-1155 smart contract.
ARu.name: description

ARv.caption: Image
ARv.doc: The image of this NFT smart contract.
ARv.name: image

ARw.caption: Primary Sale Recipient
ARw.doc: The wallet address that will receive the initial sale funds of any NFTs minted from this smart contract.
ARw.name: primary_sale_recipient

ARx.caption: Symbol
ARx.doc: This smart contracts symbol. eg = WEB
ARx.name: symbol

ARy.caption: Seller Fee Basis Points
ARy.doc: Optional: The percentage in basis points of secondary sales on NFTs minted from the market place that will be sent to the royalty fee recipient.
ARy.name: seller_fee_basis_points

ARz.caption: Fee Recipient
ARz.doc: Optional: The wallet address that will receive the funds generated from the initial sale of NFTs minted from this smart contract.
ARz.name: fee_recipient
